LanguageData.NanoPrinter.label: Nano Printer
LanguageData.NanoPrinter.description: The nano printer can produce nearly identical copies of equipment.\n\nNote: You also need a scanner to scan objects.
LanguageData.NanoScanner.label: Nano Scanner
LanguageData.NanoScanner.description: Allows an nano printer to scan the internal structure of an object.
